metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.  o Blanch green beans until tender.
  Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).    In a skillet, cook ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned.

o Sauté diced bacon, onion, and minced garlic until crispy. 
o Add cooked beans and cassava flour, stir to combine. 
o Stir in chopped parsley and salt. 
o Serve warm.
